Methods in whitecat.core.role that throw WCRoleRepositoryException
abstract  IRole RoleRepository.findRole(RoleDescriptor descriptor)
          Searches for a role implementation starting from a role descriptor.

abstract  boolean RoleRepository.installRole(RoleDescriptor descriptor, IRole role, boolean overrideIfExists)
          Installs a new role descriptor in the system.
abstract  boolean RoleRepository.removeRole(IRole role)
          Removes a role from the repository.
abstract  boolean RoleRepository.removeRole(RoleDescriptor descriptor)
          Deletes all the roles associated with this descriptor.
